official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Israel is a crucial ally of the United States and that anti-Semitism and hostility against the State of Israel should be rejected in all forms.
short_title: Maintaining Our Resolve to Defend, Encourage, and Conserve our Alliance with Israel Resolution

summary.text:
Maintaining Our Resolve to Defend, Encourage, and Conserve our Alliance with Israel Resolution or the MORDECAI Resolution

This resolution expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that Israel is a crucial ally of the United States and that anti-Semitism and hostility against Israel should be rejected in all forms.
